atg.commerce.pricing
Class PricingAdjustment

java.lang.Object
  atg.commerce.pricing.PricingAdjustment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PricingAdjustment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents an element of a price's audit trail. A chain of these objects represents all of the changes that a price has undergone. This is useful in examining how a price was calculated. These appear in the AmountInfo's adjustments list. Properties:

  • adjustmentDescription: a description of the adjustment that this object recorded
  • pricingModel: the pricing model which adjusted the price, if there was one
  • adjustment: the unit adjustment. That is to say, the price adjustment per quantity of one object whose price is being adjusted.
  • totalAdjustment: the total adjustment. This is how much the price changed.
  • quantityAdjusted: the quantity of the object whose price was adjusted.
Note: a unit adjustment amount is just the total adjustment divided by the quantity

See Also:
AmountInfo, Serialized Form
